## Change Classification

<!-- Select ONE change type (delete the others) -->

- [ ] **Policy Change** — Introduces, removes, or materially alters a rule or constraint
- [ ] **Control Tightening** — Increases enforcement, scope, or rigor without reducing safeguards
- [ ] **Clarification** — Improves precision without changing intent
- [ ] **Exception** — Temporarily deviates from an existing rule
